text:
(──Oh,
The puppets are coming along nicely)

(They're both putting so much care into making them──
...Hehe. The kids will surely be delighted)

It's great, you two.
Thanks for dressing up so nicely──
"Big brother, do you want to talk to us?"

Aah, no, umm...!
I mean, I was just talking to myself completely──!

"Talking to yourself! That sounds lonely, right?
Right, doggy?"
